name: extract-to-react
description: Chrome/Chromium extension for easy HTML to React conversion.

scripts.build: npm run build-prep && npm run build-static && npm run build-js
scripts.build-prod: npm run build-prep && npm run build-static && npm run build-js-prod && npm run build-zip
scripts.build-zip: (cd lib; zip -r ../`node -e "var pJson = require('../package.json'); console.log(pJson.name + '-' + pJson.version)"`.zip ./*)
scripts.build-gfx: (cd src; tar -cf - $(find ./gfx -name "*.png")) | tar -C lib -xf - && (cp src/gfx/icon_128.png lib/ || true)
scripts.build-html: (cd src; tar -cf - $(find ./html -name "*.html")) | tar -C lib -xf - && cp src/devtools.html lib/devtools.html
scripts.build-manifest: node -e "var manifest = require('./src/manifest.json'); manifest.version = require('./package.json').version; console.log(JSON.stringify(manifest, null, 2));" > lib/manifest.json
scripts.build-static: npm run build-gfx && npm run build-css && npm run build-html && npm run build-manifest
scripts.build-js: find ./src/js -maxdepth 1 -name '*.js' -exec bash -c 'browserify "$0" -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -g [ envify --NO_WRITE_FS --NODE_ENV="development" ] -g uglifyify -o "${0/src/lib}"' {} \;
scripts.build-js-prod: find ./src/js -maxdepth 1 -name '*.js' -exec bash -c 'browserify "$0" -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -g [ envify --NO_WRITE_FS --GA_TRACKING_ID="UA-73151166-1" --NODE_ENV="production" ] -g uglifyify | uglifyjs -cm --screw-ie8 -o "${0/src/lib}"' {} \;
